statements: SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date, user_id, engagement_score FROM social_media_post_scheduling;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_post_scheduling ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_post_scheduling WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT post_id, engagement_score FROM social_media_post_scheduling WHERE engagement_score > 8;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_posts FROM social_media_post_scheduling GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_posts > 5 ORDER BY num_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_post_scheduling WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, engagement_score FROM social_media_post_scheduling WHERE post_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT post_id, post_date, engagement_score FROM social_media_post_scheduling WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM social_media_post_scheduling GROUP BY user_id HAVING post_count > 5;
SELECT user_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_engagement FROM social_media_post_scheduling GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_engagement DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM post_engagement;
SELECT post_content, engagement_score FROM post_engagement WHERE post_id = 123;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_engagement WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT post_id, engagement_score, post_content FROM post_engagement ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, scheduled_time FROM schedule WHERE is_posted = false;
SELECT * FROM post_engagement WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM post_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 0.5 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM post_engagement ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT post_content, engagement_score FROM post_engagement WHERE user_id = 5 AND engagement_score < 0.3;
SELECT post_id, scheduled_time FROM schedule WHERE is_posted = FALSE ORDER BY scheduled_time ASC;
SELECT post_content, user_id, post_date FROM social_media_posts;
SELECT user_id, likes_count, comments_count FROM user_engagement WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT post_id, post_content, engagement_score FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, followers_count, last_post_date FROM user_engagement WHERE likes_count > 500 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT scheduling_id, scheduled_date, scheduled_time, status FROM scheduled_posts WHERE status = 'scheduled';
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_content, engagement_score FROM social_media_posts WHERE engagement_score > 100 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM social_media_posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING post_count > 5;
SELECT user_id, followers_count, likes_count, comments_count FROM user_engagement ORDER BY followers_count DESC, likes_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, scheduled_date, scheduled_time FROM scheduled_posts WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY scheduled_date, scheduled_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE follower_count > 100;
SELECT user_id, username, email, engagement_score FROM user_profiles WHERE engagement_score > 8.0;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_date FROM post_schedule ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, peak_engagement_time FROM engagement_patterns WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE follower_count > 1000 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT post_date, post_content, engagement_level FROM post_schedule WHERE engagement_level = 'high' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT post_id, likes, shares, comments FROM post_engagement WHERE post_id = 10 AND (likes > 100 OR shares > 50);
SELECT user_id, pattern_name, peak_engagement_time FROM engagement_patterns WHERE peak_engagement_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT engagement_id, engagement_type FROM engagements ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM schedules WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01' AND schedule_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT post_id, user_id, engagement_type, engagement_date FROM engagements ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM schedules WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM analytics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_time;
